channel.description: Recent content in resist on LRG

item.title: Tweet
item.description: Hmm, do we want the clown or the cad? The self-serving buffoon or the hawk? Both will fight to the death! Oh wait… No, Johnson will win, and Hunt will be given a senior cabinet position. My money’s on home secretary. Besides, most of us don’t get a choice. #Resist ‚ù§Ô∏è 1 | üîÉ 0

item.title: Tweet
item.description: Beginning to think that Trump supporters don’t really see any collusion with Russia, real or imagined, as much of a problem. In much the same way as they don’t care about the fascism, race hate, misogyny or child abuse. They just see a King. They want to obey. #Resist ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0

item.title: Tweet
item.description: A friend, living in the US on a visa, was sent this by her lawyer. Looks like I won’t be getting into the States any time soon. #resist ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 4
